org.lantern
Class DefaultXmppHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.lantern.DefaultXmppHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
LanternService, Shutdownable, XmppHandler
public class DefaultXmppHandler
extends Object
implements XmppHandler

Handles logging in to the XMPP server and processing trusted users through the roster.
